mapper.select: SELECT code, name, tel, address, x, y FROM bank
SELECT code, name, tel, address, x, y FROM bank WHERE code = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bank (code, name, tel, address, x, y) VALUES (#{code}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{x}, #{y})
mapper.update: UPDATE bank SET name = #{name}, tel = #{tel}, address = #{address}, x = #{x}, y = #{y} WHERE code = #{code}
